BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWCA_CAN_ITEM_ISSUE_TRN( GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_INDENT_NO ,DT_INDENT_DATE, NUM_CANT_ID ,STR_SHIFT,STR_INDENTER_NAME, DT_OF_ISSUE,STR_ISSUED_BY,STR_STATUS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID, NUM_TOTAL_COST) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_TRN SET STR_STATUS=2 WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_INDENT_GEN_DTL SET STR_STATUS=2 WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_ITEM_ISSUE_TRN SET DT_OF_ISSUE=?,STR_ISSUED_BY=?,NUM_TOTAL_COST=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1

UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_ITEM_ISSUE_DTL SET NUM_QTY_ISSUED=?,STR_REMARKS=?,NUM_ING_ISSUED_COST=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_INGREDIENT_ITEM_ID=? AND STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_ITEM_ISSUE_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_ITEM_ISSUE_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_INDENT_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISWCA_CAN_ING_INVENTORY( GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_CANT_ID, DT_INVENT_UPDATE_DATE, NUM_INGREDIENT_ITEM_ID, NUM_CURRENT_QTY, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISWCA_CAN_ING_INVENTORY A SET A.DT_INVENT_UPDATE_DATE=?, A.NUM_CURRENT_QTY=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE A.NUM_CANT_ID=? AND A.NUM_INGREDIENT_ITEM_ID=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
